def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 3):
        for x,y,z in permutations(config):
            check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
            check_x_huge = is_large(x, ctx)
            check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
            check_y_tiny_black = is_small(y, ctx) and is_dark(y, ctx)
            check_y_11oclock_x = is_above(y, x, ctx) and is_left(y, x, ctx)
            check_z_tiny = is_small(z, ctx)
            check_z_surround_x = all([get_distance(x, dot, ctx) < get_distance(y, dot, ctx) for dot in idxs if dot not in [x,y,z]])
            if (
                check_xyz_close
                and check_x_huge
                and check_x_dark
                and check_y_tiny_black
                and check_y_11oclock_x
                and check_z_tiny
                and check_z_surround_x
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y,z]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
